originalText.text: Dr. Dove has provided valuable insight into my health. As my primary care physician he has given me the tools to maintain a healthy choices and not just taking a bunch of medicine. His patience and expertise has helped me for close to ten years.

text.text: Dr. Dove has provided valuable insight into my health. As my primary care physician he has given me the tools to maintain a healthy choices and not just taking a bunch of medicine. His patience and expertise has helped me for close to ten years.

originalText.text: Dr. Dove was recommended to me by my baby sitter. His office is right down the block. How convenient. His office is clean and I never have to wait long. Dr. Dove is makes me feel comfortable and is on top of all my medical issues. I highly recommend him to everybody.

text.text: Dr. Dove was recommended to me by my baby sitter. His office is right down the block. How convenient. His office is clean and I never have to wait long. Dr. Dove is makes me feel comfortable and is on top of all my medical issues. I highly recommend him to everybody.

originalText.text:
I had my early check up with him and he was great! Easy to book appointments, his receptionist went above and beyond to make all the necessary accommodations and explained all details meticulously.

Dr Dove is extremely attentive and careful, he answered all my questions, and made me feel very comfortable and like i can trust him! I had a superb experience and will definitely be back and recommend his care.

text.text:
I had my early check up with him and he was great! Easy to book appointments, his receptionist went above and beyond to make all the necessary accommodations and explained all details meticulously.

Dr Dove is extremely attentive and careful, he answered all my questions, and made me feel very comfortable and like i can trust him! I had a superb experience and will definitely be back and recommend his care.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Dove's for more than ten years. He's  a wonderful doctor, and most of all he cares about his patients. He listens to my concerns, and always give me excellent health care. I talked about him so much, my family members go to him for their medical care. Thank God for Dr. Dove.

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Dove's for more than ten years. He's  a wonderful doctor, and most of all he cares about his patients. He listens to my concerns, and always give me excellent health care. I talked about him so much, my family members go to him for their medical care. Thank God for Dr. Dove.

originalText.text: Dr. Dove is a wonderful physician. He is very thorough and caring. I specially loved how he really took the time to explain my blood test results and listened carefully to my concerns. In addition, he has a very pleasant and competent office staff. I highly recommend becoming his patient!
